name: BTS Love Yourself Hoodie
description: Stay warm and stylish with this BTS hoodie from their Map of the Soul Tour. Made from high-quality cotton and available in multiple sizes.

name: BLACKPINK KLT T-Shirt
description: Show your love for BLACKPINK with this trendy Kill This Love T-Shirt. Made from comfortable cotton and available in multiple sizes.

name: TWICE Eyes Wide Open Album
description: Get your hands on the latest album from TWICE, Eyes Wide Open! Includes hit tracks like 'I Can't Stop Me' and 'More & More'.

name: EXO Obsession Lightstick
description: Complete your EXO collection with the Obsession lightstick. Features multiple lighting modes and a sleek design.

name: Red Velvet Psycho Album
description: Don't miss out on Red Velvet's latest album, Psycho! Includes hit tracks like 'Psycho' and 'In & Out'.

name: ATEEZ Treasure EP.1: All to Zero Album
description: Discover ATEEZ's debut album, Treasure EP.1: All to Zero. Includes hit tracks like 'Pirate King' and 'Treasure'.
